Articles.Content: I buy the hill. It is now my perfectly legal hill.

A group of indigenous people put a claim into the government about this hill being a sacred site

The legal battle rages for years and you run out of money

The tax department sells the hill to recoup back taxes from you

No one is certain who owns the hill

After nearly a decade of back-and-forth debate, it is decided that the hill shall be put up for auction to the highest bidder.

I bid twenty dollars and nobody bids any more.

My $20 hill.

I sue you for all you've got. This includes the hill.

I win. My hill.

I Buy the hill for 3 million dollars and then also by its resource rights (I cant remember the legal term) and executive all native people......

MY LEGALLY impervious hill!

i intervene militarily with a load of lasers and explosions

my hill

I come in with larger lasers and even more explode-y explosives.

My hill, again.

I call for an Intergalactic Bombardment

My slightly atomized hill

Reality check! The green hill is back.

No one's hill.

I capture the hill and build a fort made out of iron

My hill with an iron fort

I diplomatically enlist the help of contractors and lawyers to propose that your Iron fort is out-of-date, eventually leading to a 50-50% stake in the hill between myself and Tobbzzzz, where I promptly destroy the iron fort and make a steel one in its place. Out of anger, Tobbzzzz leaves.

My steel-forted Hill.

I pierce a wall, get in, and plant my flag. I then rebuild the flag.

Oh yeah and I pushed Maximus off the hill,

My hill.

You walked into my trap and is stranded there since. I left amid the commotion.

Sesni's command-less hill.

I fire my Ion Cannon, destroying the hill.

My completly destroyed hill.

>C:\Windows\System32>restart

>Restarting server... -F8

>Select option -repair

>Starting repair manager...

>Repair manager started. Loading mirror...

>Mirror loaded. Repairing OS...

>OS repaired. Restarting...

>Loading OS...

>OS loaded.

>C:\Windows\system32\hillServer.bat

>Loading hillServer...

>Server loaded!

>C:\Windows\System32>ban.exe -ban Tobbzzzz

>Tobbzzzz is banned from server.

The hill have been restored and Tobbzzzz is banned from the server.

No one's hill, because Tobbzzzz is already banned.

(OOC: Do NOT, in any circumstances, destroy the hill in any way.)

It says in the OP you can destroy the hill.

I claim the hill.

My hill.

It says in the OP you can destroy the hill.

I claim the hill.

My hill.

Well, if there's no other hill, then how are we going to capture another hill? We need to keep one hill alive, at least!

Anyway, I sniped you afar. No one's hill.

I fire Jinx's Super Mega Death Rocket at the hill, then build a new one.

My new hill.
I modestly use a shovel to dig away your hill, and buy new dirt to build one. I bury Tobbzzzz in the process. My hill.

A bunch of quantum nonsense happens and that somehow makes the hill mine.

My hill.

Another bunch of quantum nonsense rocks the hill and the hill becomes... still your hill.

What?

I send my top researchers to investigate, and determine that the best way to claim the hill is to let the Kraken feed on the quantum nonsense the next time it occurs.

My hill.

I initiate the Kraken, then build a new one after one is devoured.

My hill.

I turn your hill inside-out and trap you in the center.

You are forced to survive the rest of your life inside the hill, because it is still yours.

I somehow escape the kraken that was attacking me and I use MOAR BOOSTERS to propel the kraken towards the hill to take it over. I then realize that I cannot take the hill if the kraken is on it, so I just deem it not my problem and leave.

Kraken's hill.

I've managed to dig my way out of the hill and kill the Kraken (via boosters) then placed the hill for sail for $4 quadrillion while I walk away from the hill.

My for-sale hill.
